package.name: PojavOptimize
package.shortDescription: Minecraft: Java Edition, optimized for iOS.

descriptionlist.description: A collection of mods for PojavLauncher to make it go brrrr (from 1 to 40 FPS!)
Requires that PojavLauncher be installed with Fabric.
Credit to Chunk_Norris_ for assembling and helping with this package!
